compress() - Method in class com.ojcoleman.bain.base.SynapseCollection
Remove synapses that are not in use (see SynapseCollection.isNotUsed(int)) and reconfigure the SynapseCollection to move these towards the end of the collection, then sets the "populated" size (see ComponentCollection.setSizePopulated(int)) of the collection accordingly so that calculations for the unused synapses are not performed.
configs - Variable in class com.ojcoleman.bain.base.ConfigurableComponentCollection
